edu.umd.cs.psl.application.learning.weight.random

Class MetropolisRandOM

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • edu.umd.cs.psl.application.learning.weight.WeightLearningApplication
        • edu.umd.cs.psl.application.learning.weight.random.MetropolisRandOM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelApplication
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FirstOrderMetropolisRandOM, GroundMetropolisRandOM

    public abstract class MetropolisRandOM
extends WeightLearningApplication
    Abstract class that learns new weights for the CompatibilityKernels in a Model using Metropolis MCEM RandOM learning.
